text: Mumina purausa arau mumina narai ijane sijanara bandhu, sihamte satkarmara adesa diye arau asatkarmata badha diye, chalata kayema karae yakata pradana karae arau allaha arau te'omra raachulara anugatya karae; e'omlokake'i allahe anatipalame daya karaiba. Niscaya allaha paraakramasali, prajnamaya
